main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Clinton, MD on 5-3-52 for a duration of 0-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported as stationary and glistening, similar in appearance to a half dollar,The sighting was made by a civilian observer who was an Air Intelligence Officer during WWII,Possibly the same object had been observed in the same area on several previous occasions,Weather conditions were adequate for visibility during the sighting,The assessment of the sighting eventually led to a recommendation to cancel further investigation due to insufficient evidence.
